Legacy Document

Important: The information in this document is obsolete and should not be used for new development.

Inside Macintosh: Networking With Open Transport / Part 2 - Open Transport Reference

Chapter 29 - TCP/IP Services Reference

This chapter documents the constants, data structures and functions used by the TCP/IP service provider. It also provides mapper and endpoint ifnormation for TCP/IP. The chapter "TCP/IP Services" describes the use of these structures and functions in opening and using TCP/IP endpoints and mappers.
